title: The Narrative Engine

panel_structure.description: A road abruptly ending at a cliff edge, but ghostly bridge of narrative threads desperately trying to maintain continuity across the void—the engine of self struggling against discontinuity
Person partially visible beneath heavy theater curtain, body as puppet with biological strings, the role of 'person' being performed until the final curtain drops

transformation_notes: The two panels present competing visions of what we might be—either stories desperately maintaining coherence across life's gaps, or biological actors performing temporary roles.
